title: "An escape signal for the nematode: Artificial intelligence helps elucidate structure of a novel light sensor"
excerpt: "The small Caenorhabditis elegans nematode avoids light. While it does not have eyes, some of its cells contain a protein called LITE-1, which warns it of the sun, whose rays are dangerous for the animal."
